sub_title: Research And Development Engineer at imec

projects.title: Head of the emergency response team (hoofd BHV)

contributors.headline: Research And Development Engineer at imec

projects.title: Lab manager of the AGILE (Advanced Gas, Ion and Liquid sEnsing) lab
projects.description: In December 2021 I started with a new challenge: professionalizing 'our' Agile lab. In the past this lab was used by researchers to show costumers a proof of principles. Nowadays the lab is used more and more to test the reliability and  performance of the developed transducers. This requires a better documentations and consistent experimentation. Also calibrations of measurement tools become more important. Moreover, as lab manager I also became responsible of the safety in the lab.

contributors.headline: Research And Development Engineer at imec

projects.title: Project lead of WP1 for the Internet of Water (IoW)
projects.description: The Internet of Water (IoW) is a pilot project for an intelligent water management system in Flanders. To accomplish this a network of 2500 wireless fluid sensors that permanently measure certain aspects of the quality of surface water, groundwater and wastewater. The task of WP1: the sensor-chips developed within Imec integrate in a sensor module. This sensor module must be cheap, watertight, robust and small enough to fit in small water pipes. Moreover, we must ensure that the data will arrive at the customer and that this data is correct.

contributors.headline: Research And Development Engineer at imec

projects.title: Research and development engineer
projects.description: Development of the conductivity sensor. This means designing, outsourcing the production and electrical characterisation of the sensor. Moreover, in the same period carrying out long time stability testing of the pH-sensor, analyzing data and reporting to customer

contributors.headline: Research And Development Engineer at imec

projects.title: Process engineer & Research development engineer
projects.description: Developing process flows within the Si-technology for all kind of sensors and harvesters in the Mi-Plaza (PiNS) clean-room. This was hands on work in the clean room, but also designing and drawing masks.

projects.title: Research engineer in the interconnect-project (Silicon Technology)
projects.description: C010/C013 back-end process integration and plasma etching of low-K materials in a collaborative project between Philips Research Leuven and IMEC.
